entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 8 May 2023
